mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project(projIdx, empIdx, projName, createdAt, startDate, endDate, status) VALUES(project_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empIdx}, #{projName}, SYSDATE, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT teamIdx, t.deptIdx, teamName FROM team t LEFT OUTER JOIN department d ON t.deptIdx = d.deptIdx WHERE t.deptIdx = #{deptIdx}
SELECT empIdx FROM employee WHERE empName = #{empName}
SELECT empIdx, empName, deptIdx FROM employee WHERE deptIdx='F' AND INSTR(empName, #{empName}) > 0
SELECT NVL(COUNT(projIdx), 0) FROM project p JOIN employee e ON p.empIdx = e.empIdx

SELECT p.projIdx, projName, TO_CHAR(createdAt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') createdAt, e.empName FROM project p JOIN employee e ON p.empIdx = e.empIdx ORDER BY projIdx DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projectMember(memberIdx, projIdx, empIdx, teamName, role) VALUES(projectMember_seq.NEXTVAL, #{projIdx}, #{empIdx}, #{teamName}, #{role})
